title: Highschool Aurabuster: Hikari no Mezame
synopsis: Animation of a very popular novel series by the writer WAKAGI Mio (若木未生), also adapted as a manga by MORI Makoto (杜 真琴), serialised in LaLa. The novels feature illusatrations by KOUGA Yun (高河 ゆん), and the character designs for the anime are based on these. The OVA is an original story that includes the early parts of the novels.
staff: [['Kamegaki, Hajime', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Fujino, Sadayoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Watanabe, Mami', ['Script']], ['Yonekura, Chihiro', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
